contentList.content: You were raised from death to be a servant of a tyrant Lich, but have broken free and now wield Runic might for your own aims.
You gain 3 Runes, which are restored on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
You gain the ability to engrave runes onto your weapons to enhance them with magical effects.
Engrave a rune onto your weapon to enhance it with magical effects.
Runes do not have any effect if their wielders do not have the ability to <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Runeforging">Runeforge</LSTag>.
Engrave your weapon(s) with a rune that adds [1] to attacks.
Engrave your weapon(s) with a rune that restores [1] on a hit.
Engrave your weapon with a rune that gives its wielder +1 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. Works only for Main Hand weapons.
You learn new ways to channel your Runic magic.

You are considered to be Undead. You are can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> and are immune to many mind altering spells, but can't be healed by many traditional healing spells.
Your Runes refresh on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Convert 2 of one Rune into 1 of another Rune.
When attacking with a Runeforged weapon, you deal an additional [1].
You gain power that rivals even that of the Lich that turned you.
You are an icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes.
You gain a Frost Rune. These are restored on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Chill your weapon with icy power and strike an enemy for a bonus [1] and slow their movement speed by [2] for 2 turns.
A brutal attack that deals a bonus [1].
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a bonus [1].
Blast the target with a frigid wind, inflicting targets with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROST_FEVER">Frost Fever</LSTag>.
Movement speed reduced by [1]. Takes [2] per turn.
A sweeping attack that strikes up to [1] enemies in front of you.
On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">critical hits</LSTag>, the bonus Cold damage dealt is additionally doubled.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Frostscythe">Frostscythe</LSTag> using 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FrostRune">Frost Rune</LSTag>.
Shackles the target with frozen chains, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">restraining</LSTag> them.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ChainsOfIce">Chains of Ice</LSTag> using 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FrostRune">Frost Rune</LSTag>.
When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on a creature, your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HowlingBlast">Howling Blast</LSTag> has no resource cost.
Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_HowlingBlast">Howling Blast</LSTag> has no resource cost.

Your next <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Obliterate">Obliterate</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Frostscythe">Frostscythe</LSTag> will be a guaranteed <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.

When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Obliterate">Obliterate</LSTag>, refund 1 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FrostRune">Frost Rune</LSTag>. On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, refund 2.
You are a dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain yourself in the face of an enemy onslaught.
You gain a Blood Rune. These are restored on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
You are a master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do your bidding.
You gain an Unholy Rune. These are restored on a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
